title.narrative: Reconstruction of Kabul-Jalalabad-Torkham Highway, Lot No 2 Sarobi-Jalalabad

description.narrative: The project includes the rehabilitation/reconstruction of the highway from Sarobi to Jalalabad. The work scope comprises preparation and necessary repair of the underlying material, widening and preparation of the existing pavement, asphalt overlay, raising shoulders, earthworks, construction and rehabilitation of bridges, culverts and retaining walls, traffic safety works and all associated temporary works.
